\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	X \&\& {V_X \oplus V_Y} \&\& {U_X \oplus V_Y} \& {\,} \\
	Y \&\& {V_Y} \&\& {U_Y} \& {\,}
	\arrow["{\binom {v_X}0}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["p"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{u_X \oplus 1_{V_Y}}", from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{(V_f, 1)}"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_X \oplus 0}", from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{(U_f,u_Y)}"', from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{v_Y}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{u_Y}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_Y}", from=2-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
